content.prompt: The excerpt could best be used by a historian studying which of the following historical developments?

choices.label: The reasons for the outbreak of the American Revolutionary War in the later 1700s
The reduction in western land made available for White settlement in the later 1800s
The arguments used by politicians in support of Reconstruction policies in the late 1800s
The persistence of popular isolationist sentiment in the United States in the early 1900s

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain the significance of a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience, including how these might limit the use(s) of a source.
